definition: tired/weary/to strain/to wear out/to work hard
to accumulate/to involve or implicate (Taiwan pr. [lei4])/continuous/repeated
to encumber/to be a burden on/to implicate
(literary) (of fruit, achievements etc) clusters of/piles of/heaps of/gaunt/haggard/wretched/Taiwan pr. [lei3 lei3]

to involve/to implicate sb/to spread to others (harm, trouble, damage etc)
superfluous/cumbersome/a burden on sb/a nuisance to sb/to inconvenience/to tie sb down/long-winded (of writing)/also pr. [lei2 zhui5]
to be put to a lot of trouble
to get dragged into/to get involved (on sb else's account)

sentences.english: Do not be hasty when climbing, sit for a while if you get tired.
sentences.chinese: 登山的時候不能急，累了就小坐片刻。

sentences.english: Expensive into mom to take care of small into also very tired, she fell asleep sitting there.
sentences.chinese: 貴成媽爲照顧小成也很累，她坐在那裏就睡着了。

sentences.english: Really feel very tired now, very tired, but all have no.
sentences.chinese: 現在真的覺得好累，好累，可是都沒有。

sentences.english: Really feel very tired now, very tired, but all have no.
sentences.chinese: 現在真的覺得好累，好累，可是都沒有。

sentences.english: He drove the workers until they collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 他迫使工人們幹得一個個累趴在地。

sentences.english: But the little squirrel too tired to say a word.
sentences.chinese: 可是小松鼠累得說不出一句話來了。

sentences.english: For I'm wearied wi hunting, and fain wad lie down.
sentences.chinese: 我打完獵好累，快讓我躺下。

sentences.english: I was so tired that I fell asleep.
My legs were tired with jumping and my face burned.
sentences.chinese: 我的雙腿蹦得累極了，臉也凍得火辣辣的。

sentences.english: I was tired after shoveling snow all day.
sentences.chinese: 鏟了一天的雪我很累了。

sentences.english: At night, LJ is tucked against a wall, cold and tired.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚，LJ隱藏在一堵牆後，感到又冷又累。

sentences.english: It's late at night and you're tired.
sentences.chinese: 天色已晚而且你也累了。

sentences.english: I am too tired and sleepy to open my eyes now.
sentences.chinese: 現在感覺又累又瞌睡，眼睛都睜不不開了。

sentences.english: My horse is dead beat , and I can't get him no further than the stable.
sentences.chinese: 我的馬太累了，我不能把它趕到比馬房更遠的地方。

sentences.english: We whether only visible with stranger, only then cannot be tired?
sentences.chinese: 我們能否只要形同陌路，纔不會累？
